indexes.name: user_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_pkey ON public."user" USING btree (id)

indexes.name: user_email_key
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX user_email_key ON public."user" USING btree (email)

indexes.name: post_pkey
indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX post_pkey ON public.post USING btree (id)

constraints.name: post_authorId_fkey
constraints.def: FOREIGN KEY ("authorId") REFERENCES "user"(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT

relations.def: FOREIGN KEY ("authorId") REFERENCES "user"(id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT

driver.name: postgres
driver.database_version: PostgreSQL 17.4 (Debian 17.4-1.pgdg120+2) on x86_64-pc-linux-gnu, compiled by gcc (Debian 12.2.0-14) 12.2.0, 64-bit
